subject: Basketball (College)
Diamond Head Classic (College Basketball)
lead_paragraph: Jake Odum banked in a 15-footer with eight-tenths of a second left in overtime to rally Indiana State to a 57-55 win over Miami in the third-place game of the Diamond Head Classic in Honolulu.
snippet: Jake Odum banked in a 15-footer with eight-tenths of a second left in overtime to rally Indiana State to a 57-55 win over Miami in the third-place game of the Diamond Head Classic in Honolulu.
